bibl.title: Interim Notes on 'Two New Poems of Sappho'.
bibl.note: P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= LDAB 341738). - I. Line Numeration. - II. The Speaker and Age of the Persona. - III. 'Brothers Poem'. - IV. 'Kypris Poem'. - V. Conservation and Condition.
